nodes.text: Shey Tapani University, an institute named after Emperor Shey Tapani, was located on Estalle Island and Destato Island on Procopia in the Tapani sector. The institution was established the year that the first Emperor brought his new government to Procopia.

The ancient campus on Estalle Island once constituted the entirety of the university, but the school grew too large and the cost of real-estate on Estalle Island meant that the rest of the institution was located on Destato Island, approximately 400 kilometers away. At the time of the Galactic Civil War, the original campus only contained the legal graduate school, the university's upper administrative offices, and a museum.
